doc:
Michael Conrad https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Conrad 0 Michael Conrad (October 16, 1925 – November 22, 1983) was an American actor perhaps best known for his portrayal of veteran cop Sgt. Phil Esterhaus on Hill Street Blues, in which he ended the introductory roll call to each week's show with "Let's be careful out there". He won two Emmy Awards for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Drama Series for Hill Street Blues in 1981 and 1982. Michael_Conrad ( October_16_,_1925 – November_22_,_1983 ) was an_American_actor perhaps_best_known for his_portrayal of veteran_cop_Sgt._Phil_Esterhaus on Hill_Street_Blues , in which he ended the_introductory_roll_call to each_week 's_show with " Let 's_be careful out there_" . He won two_Emmy_Awards for Outstanding_Supporting_Actor in a_Drama_Series for Hill_Street_Blues in 1981_and_1982 .
